alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 07 at 2:39AM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 20 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region Zone. * WHEN...From late Monday night through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For areas east of the divide, Highway 2 between East Glacier Park and Marias Pass will be the most affected area.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
